name: Galaxy S22 Ultra
description: Discover the power of innovation with the Galaxy S22 Ultra. Its advanced camera system, coupled with the powerful Exynos 2200 processor, delivers exceptional performance and unrivaled photography capabilities.

name: iPhone 14 Pro Max
description: Experience the epitome of luxury and performance with the iPhone 14 Pro Max. The A16 Bionic chip powers incredible features, while the Pro camera system captures moments in stunning detail.

name: Pixel 7 Pro
description: Elevate your mobile experience with the Pixel 7 Pro. The Google Tensor processor enables AI-driven capabilities, and the advanced camera system delivers exceptional photo and video quality.

name: OnePlus 10
description: Unleash uncompromising speed and style with the OnePlus 10. The Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor ensures seamless performance, while the sleek design reflects the brand's commitment to innovation.

name: Mi 12
description: Experience the future of mobile technology with the Mi 12. Powered by the Snapdragon 8cx, this flagship device delivers unparalleled performance, coupled with a cutting-edge design.
